name: Dolly (Alys_Lou)
description:
This is the story of Dolly, a dead little brother reincarnated in a doll. His goal ? Scare his twin sister using the environment and the objects.

Beware, because parents are never far away... The game takes place during the victorian era.

--

Here's the work I did for a Game Jam at HEAJ, in Belgium, with five other passionate persons. We did it in five days.

My team -

Nicolas Dinant, programming and sound design : https://nicolasdinant.artstation.com/

Alyssa Louis, modeling, rigging, animations and illustrations : https://ahzz.artstation.com/

Peter Lecoq, modeling, rigging and animations

Louis Pollet, 3D modeling and UI design

Prescilia Despineto, 3D modeling : https://prescilia-despineto.artstatio...

Manihel Foucart, 3D modeling, level design, lighting : https://manihel.artstation.com/ --
